text: @TeamTrump @realDonaldTrump BUY Puts on $TSN. $TSN will be strained by the COVID-19 crisis. Employees are afraid to return to work as they should be until $TSN can provided the PPE that is needed for protection. They do not have the liquidity to deploy $4B like $AMZN to this CRISIS.
